sub_topic: Prove that every group of prime order is cyclic.
message_1: Prove that every group of order 17 is cyclic.
message_2:
To prove that every group of order 17 is cyclic, we will use the following facts:

1. A group of prime order is always cyclic.
2. 17 is a prime number.

Let G be a group of order 17. Since 17 is a prime number, by fact 1, G must be a cyclic group. Therefore, every group of order 17 is cyclic.
